content:
WizardDesigner Class

In this Article

Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Wizard control.

Syntax

Declaration

public class WizardDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ComponentDesigner
  • HtmlControlDesigner
  • ControlDesigner
  • System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner
  • WizardDesigner

Constructors summary

WizardDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the WizardDesigner class.

Properties summary

ActionLists

Gets the action list collection for the control designer.
AutoFormats

Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the Auto Format dialog box for the associated control at design time.
DisplaySideBar

Gets or sets a property in the associated wizard control indicating whether to display a sidebar.
TemplateGroups

Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
UsePreviewControl

Gets a value indicating whether the design host should use a preview control.

Methods summary

AddDesignerRegions(DesignerRegionCollection)

Adds the provided designer region collection to the current designer regions.
ConvertToCustomNavigationTemplate()

Creates a navigation template from the active step and saves it in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate* property of the active step.
ConvertToTemplate(String,IComponent,String,String[])

Converts a selection of controls to a template in the associated control.
CreateChildControls()

Creates the child controls of the associated control.
GetDesignTimeHtml()

Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
GetDesignTimeHtml(DesignerRegionCollection)

Retrieves the HTML markup to display the control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion)

Gets the content for the editable region of the control at design time.
Initialize(IComponent)

Initializes the designer with the specified IComponent object.
OnClick(DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)

Called by the design host when the user clicks the associated control at design time.
OnComponentChanged(Object,ComponentChangedEventArgs)

Called when the associated control changes.
PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

Adds properties to or removes properties from the Properties grid in a design host, or provides new design-time settings or properties that correspond to properties on the associated control.
ResetTemplate(String,IComponent,String)

Resets the specified template to its default value.
SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion,String)

Specifies the content for an editable region of the control at design time.

Constructors

  • WizardDesigner()

    Initializes a new instance of the WizardDesigner class.

    public WizardDesigner ();

Properties

  • ActionLists

    Gets the action list collection for the control designer.

    public override System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection ActionLists { get; }

    Property Value

    • DesignerActionListCollection

      An DesignerActionListCollection object that contains the custom DesignerActionList items for the control designer.

  • AutoFormats

    Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the Auto Format dialog box for the associated control at design time.

    public override System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection AutoFormats { get; }

    Property Value

    • DesignerAutoFormatCollection

      A DesignerAutoFormatCollection object.

  • DisplaySideBar

    Gets or sets a property in the associated wizard control indicating whether to display a sidebar.

    protected bool DisplaySideBar { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to display the sidebar; otherwise, false.

  • TemplateGroups

    Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.

    public override System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection TemplateGroups { get; }

    Property Value

    • TemplateGroupCollection

      A TemplateGroupCollection object.

  • UsePreviewControl

    Gets a value indicating whether the design host should use a preview control.

    protected override bool UsePreviewControl { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to use a preview control; false to use the associated control.

Methods

  • AddDesignerRegions(DesignerRegionCollection)

    Adds the provided designer region collection to the current designer regions.

    protected virtual void AddDesignerRegions (System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions);

    Parameters

    • regions
      DesignerRegionCollection

      A DesignerRegionCollection object containing the regions to add.

  • ConvertToCustomNavigationTemplate()

    Creates a navigation template from the active step and saves it in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate* property of the active step.

    protected virtual void ConvertToCustomNavigationTemplate ();
  • ConvertToTemplate(String,IComponent,String,String[])

    Converts a selection of controls to a template in the associated control.

    protected void ConvertToTemplate (string description, System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, string templateName, string[] keys);

    Parameters

    • description
      String

      A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the operation.

    • component
      IComponent

      The wizard control associated with this designer.

    • templateName
      String

      The name of the template to convert to.

    • keys
      String[]

      An array of IDs for the controls that are to be included in the template.

  • CreateChildControls()

    Creates the child controls of the associated control.

    protected override void CreateChildControls ();
  • GetDesignTimeHtml()

    Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

    public override string GetDesignTimeHtml ();

    Returns

    • String

      The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

  • GetDesignTimeHtml(DesignerRegionCollection)

    Retrieves the HTML markup to display the control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.

    public override string GetDesignTimeHtml (System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions);

    Parameters

    • regions
      DesignerRegionCollection

      A collection of control designer regions for the associated control.

    Returns

    • String

      The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, including all control designer regions.

  • GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion)

    Gets the content for the editable region of the control at design time.

    public override string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region);

    Parameters

    • region
      EditableDesignerRegion

      An EditableDesignerRegion object.

    Returns

    • String

      The persisted content for the region, if the control designer supports editable regions; otherwise, an empty string ("").

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      region is null.

    • ArgumentException

      region is not an object of type EditableDesignerRegion.

  • Initialize(IComponent)

    Initializes the designer with the specified IComponent object.

    public override void Initialize (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);

    Parameters

    • component
      IComponent

      Use base

  • OnClick(DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)

    Called by the design host when the user clicks the associated control at design time.

    protected override void OnClick (System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs

      Use base

  • OnComponentChanged(Object,ComponentChangedEventArgs)

    Called when the associated control changes.

    public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);

    Parameters

    • sender
      Object

      The source of the event.

    • ce
      ComponentChangedEventArgs

      The event data.

    Remarks

    The OnComponentChanged method is called when a property of the associated control is changed. This lets you perform any processing that is required after a property change.

  • PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

    Adds properties to or removes properties from the Properties grid in a design host, or provides new design-time settings or properties that correspond to properties on the associated control.

    protected override void PreFilterProperties (System.Collections.IDictionary properties);

    Parameters

    • properties
      IDictionary

      An IDictionary object containing the properties for the class of the component.

  • ResetTemplate(String,IComponent,String)

    Resets the specified template to its default value.

    protected void ResetTemplate (string description, System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, string templateName);

    Parameters

    • description
      String

      A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the operation.

    • component
      IComponent

      The Wizard control associated with this designer.

    • templateName
      String

      The name of the template to reset.

  • SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion,String)

    Specifies the content for an editable region of the control at design time.

    public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);

    Parameters

    • region
      EditableDesignerRegion

      An editable design region contained within the control.

    • content
      String

      The content to assign for the editable design region.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      region is null.

    • ArgumentException

      region is not an object of type EditableDesignerRegion.
